description.english: Reach the highest rank of the defeater challenge!

description.english: Find and defeat the legendary enemy from chapter 1!

description.english: Maximise all skills in the fire skill tree!
Maximise all skills in the lightning skill tree!
Maximise all skills in the acid skill tree!

displayName.english: There is magic in the air

description.english: Maximise all skills in the arcane skill tree!

displayName.english: It's the end of the world as we know it...
displayName.german: Das Ende der Welt, wie wir sie kennen...

description.english: Knock back enemies for a total of 100 meters!
description.german: Stoße Gegner insgesamt 100 Meter nach hinten!

description.english: Hit six enemies with a single chain lightning!
description.german: Triff mit einem einzigen Kettenblitz sechs Gegner!
Stecke insgesamt 666 Gegner mit Säure an!

description.english: Charm enemies for a total of 42 minutes!
